title: Top Places to visit in Attili, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Attili is a village in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It belongs to Tanuku constituency in Kovvur revenue division.

 

Demographics

As of 2011 Census of India, Attili had a population of 25004. The total population constitute, 12509 males and 12495 females with a sex ratio of 999 females per 1000 males. 2315 children are in the age group of 0–6 years, with sex ratio of 928. The average literacy rate stands at 78.82%.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attili

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Dhone, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Dhone or Dronachalam is a town in Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a Municipality located in Dhone Mandal.

Top Places to visit in Prakasam, Ongole, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Prakasam district is an administrative district in the Coastal Andhra region of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The headquarters of the district are located at Ongole. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh.
